DOC.detailed_description: In 3-year study project , design single-blind randomize control trial ( 1 ) compare treatment effect home-based MTOT hospital-based MTOT group hospital conventional rehabilitation group , ( 2 ) investigate feasibility , satisfaction , safety home-based program , ( 3 ) identify factor might influence treatment outcomes . An estimated total 90 patient stroke recruit study . All participant randomly assign receive home-based MTOT hospital-based rehabilitation 4-week training period ( total 12 session ) . Before first treatment session , client-centered questionnaire administer patient identify individual need goal . Feasibility evaluation caregiver 's wellbeing also assess . Outcome measure conduct baseline , immediately treatment , 3 month follow-up .
